title: WEB DEVELOPER, RESPONSIVE DESIGN AND DEVELOPMENT

content.t1: Innovative Web Developer with over 10 years of experience in building, developing, and managing websites, applications and programs for various organizations.
content.t2: Working with Javascript frameworks/libraries, such as VueJS, React, Angular, and Google Web Services.
content.t3: Ability to perform well in a fast-paced, team-oriented, dynamic environment. Excellent analytical thinker and problem-solving skills with a keen attention to detail.
